title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Cake
directions: In a bowl, mix together the flour, baking powder and salt.
In a mixing bowl, beat together the butter, light brown sugar and vanilla for 1 minute until well mixed then beat on high for 15 more seconds. Beat in the egg for 30 seconds.
On low speed, beat in the dry ingredients then mix in the chocolate chips until well mixed.
Transfer the batter to a greased and lined 9” cake pan and flatten it to an even layer.
In a preheated oven to 350° bake for 18 to 22 minutes.
Let cool on the pan for 4 hours or so then turn out onto a serving plate.
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups of semi sweet chocolate chips.
